short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't just read, act. Make use of the news you consume by engaging in political action.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read, Act gives you the information and motivation needed to make your voice heard. Set a goal for political participation, stay aware of your news consumption, and be reminded to channel your reading into action. Useful tips and links help political newcomers calm their nerves and allow seasoned veterans to make the best use of their time.

Users are provided resources for:
  • Donating to causes
  • Writing to representatives
  • Calling representatives
  • Participating in rallies and marches
  • Organizing in the community
  • Attending town hall meetings


More info:
Website: readact.us
FAQ: readact.us/faq
Email: contact@readact.us
